## Install the app

If you are participating in a study using the **momenTUM** platform, please install the mobile app on your device:

- **iOS (Apple App Store):**  
  [Download on the App Store](https://apps.apple.com/de/app/tum-momentum/id6444047291?l=en-GB)

- **Android (Google Play Store):**  
  [Get it on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.tum.sg.momentum.android)

### Install via QR code
*A QR code for direct installation will be added here shortly.*

---

## During the study

Please follow the instructions provided by your study team.  
The app will guide you through questionnaires and tasks according to the study schedule.

---

If you have questions about participation or encounter technical issues, please contact your study team.
